2.2. Login to your account¶

  • Enter your registered email address e.g. newuser@ihi.or.tz

  • Enter your registered password ******

  • Then Click the “Login Button” to login to Mosquito database

If you can’t remember your registered password click Reset, an email will be sent to your email for password reset instructions.
